name: Presta
description: For traditional financial institutions who struggle to lend to small businesses, Presta provides an all-in-one lending platform that allows them to spend more time building relationships and less time managing tedious, manual parts of the lending process.
one_liner: For traditional financial institutions who struggle to lend to small businesses, Presta provides an all-in-one lending platform that allows them to spend more time building relationships and less time managing tedious, manual parts of the lending process.
